long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: BioJupies Generator is a Jupyter Notebooks generator that enables users to easily create, store, and deploy Jupyter Notebooks containing RNA-seq data analyses. Through an intuitive interface, novice users can rapidly generate tailored reports to analyze RNA-seq datasets from the NCBI's gene expression omnibus (GEO). The reports contain data visualization of the samples, differential expression and enrichment analyses, and querying signatures against the LINCS L1000 dataset for small molecule that can mimic or reverse signatures. By combining an intuitive user interface for notebook generation with options to generate custom analysis scripts, BioJupies Generator addresses computational needs of both experimental and computational biologists.
